title: Coronavirus update: 'Not based on facts': China reacts to Payne's call for investigation
description: China dismisses Australia's questioning of how Beijing handled the coronavirus pandemic, saying Foreign Minister Marise Payne calling for an international investigation is "not based on facts".
content:
Posted 
April 21, 2020 03:15:28
China dismisses Australia's questioning of how Beijing handled the coronavirus pandemic, while New York is set to remain in lockdown for weeks and the Mayor of Estonia's 'corona island' resigns.
This story is being updated r… [+6571 chars]
